post.body: Tyre pressure will vary with temperature, it will also bleed through the valve I know this makes no sense but I never make sense
http://twitpic.com/x97c - K pereira and K rose, Back together on the same screen brings back memories of the old AOTS
the wire is the best cops/gangsters show ever, only problem is you end up watching half a season at a time 'cause its so good
I have to cam or mic but I'm there is spirit, or should I say spirits WOOT spiced rum
G'night . don't forget life is a series of intangible moments and our interactions with others are deeper than I can comprehend. enjoy life.
When will the ABC re-run "the Librarians" bob franklin was piss funny in it
Turn your smile into a frown, turn your wardrobe upside down, JUMPER PANTS!!! yes I know it should be frown into smile but that rhymes
Listening to old episodes of "Get this". best radio show ever, too bad they were axed in '07. Nerd heaven. ever worn a jumper for pants?
Watch out for the "thugs in the scallop industry" ... I'm listening to Rex hunts address to the nation "this is dizzy stuff folks"
need a drink refill but I have a dog and a cat sleeping on me, never lay down on the couch here, you will get slept on
My two favourite Kevins http://twitpic.com/x97c
Drink-a-thon break a.k.a time to sleep, with me luck with the hangover, woah where did my pants go? I'm still wearing shoes, strange.
Must voyage outside to retrieve the captain morgons spiced gold from the freezer, best served ice cold, like revenge, MUA HA HA HA
Tiki bar 48 hour drink-a-thon, prepare to be punished liver, must get a crate of aspirin and berocca.
Now it's Pantera. I have to make some playlists, now it's the Doors WTF? I gotta stick to one genre at a time
Listening to iTunes on shuffle, I have an eclectic collection, All trancy, then I get hit with Beethoven then Xzibit, and thats the first 3
he's a cat, meow, flushing a toilet DAMN YOU PARRY GRIPP get your songs out of my head. Watch this http://tinyurl.com/99lezp if you dare
watching the boxing day test, OZZY OZZY OZZY, I have to sneak out later for a bottle of havanna club white, limes and soda, mojitos tonight.
goodnight twitterverse or good morning depending on where you're located. Spread the love and hug someone who deserves it (or just needs it)
Ever had a dream where you are talking to yourself as someone else? I don't know whats scarier looking at me or the subject discussed, weird
